description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. It's the night before Christmas, and Santa is running late!  Join him as he flies over the city streets delivering presents by throwing them from his sleigh into the chimneys below.  It's up to you to decide how well Santa can save Christmas and see how many presents you can deliver within the time limit!
description.short: It's the night before Christmas, and Santa is running late!  Join him as he flies over the city streets delivering presents by throwing them from his sleigh into the chimneys below.
